title: Visual Novel Expressions - Anime Sound Effects
description: Add this awesome sound effects to make your visual novel come to life!
longDescription:
Hello Developer!


In this Pack you will find 394 sound effects that were created thinking about visual novels, voices like: Screaming, Sad, Happy, Surprised, Laughing, Crying, Attacking, Mumbling, Bored, Proud, among others. Even if the game you're making isn't a visual novel, it's interesting to take a look at this pack because I'm sure it can fulfill a number of needs when it comes to voice.


Check the preview

Check the Documentation


Quality

All sound effects were professionally and original made. by voice actors hired specifically for this job. you will have sounds that will surely get the message across to the user and raise the quality level of your game.


Variety

To create this pack, many different words and vowels were said in different styles, and you can do things in the game like add reverb to sound like a ghost, pitch up to sound like a cartoon, or lower to sound like a monster.


Helping each other.

By investing in this package you are taking a series of great sound effects to your project and also encouraging me to create other libraries for developers, I hope you like it a lot, as this will motivate you to continue with your project, and will motivate you to continue creating content .


Ease

The sounds created in this library are already ready, just import and use, I bring this as a facilitator for the development team, just put it in the project, implement it, and that's it!


License

non-exclusive license â€“ you are free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim/resell as your own work.
